body:
Nithin and Austin are no longer with the group, I was added as a maintainer to the base MV2 package during the last release. Nick Contini is a new software engineer and soon to be PhD student with our group who will be assisting me as a maintainer on our Spack packages. This patch adds us as maintainers on all MV2 packages. 

We also update one of the dependencies for MV2-GDR.
title: Update MVAPICH2 Maintainers and GDR Dependencies
